llm_decision.raw:
LANGUAGE: Bulgarian  
TRANSCRIPTION: Тогава накичих шапката си, състава урва перо и залюбих най-хубавото момиче на света  
CONFIDENCE: high  
REASONING: The most accurate and coherent transcription comes from the MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained system, which uses a native Cyrillic lexicon and produces a grammatically correct and contextually meaningful sentence. While OmniASR has a similar structure, it contains errors like "урлоло" instead of "урва" and "най-хобоотономиче" instead of "най-хубавото". The MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained version correctly renders "накичих шапката си" (I fastened my hat), "състава урва перо" (it consists of a feather), and "залюбих най-хубавото момиче на света" (I fell in love with the most beautiful girl in the world). The phrase "състава урва перо" is likely a misrendering of "състава
